trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGZF101_05155_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Wezetonyi has a potentially profitable proposal for you.
TEXT_KINGZF101_05155_TODO_00<tab>Search for anything that can be repurposed.
TEXT_KINGZF101_05155_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the silver necklace to Wezetonyi.
TEXT_KINGZF101_05155_WEZETONYI_000_000<tab>Hey, you're the one who was looking for Gulool Ja! Would you say that you're good at finding things, generally speaking?
TEXT_KINGZF101_05155_WEZETONYI_000_001<tab>In that case, you might do well as a reforger. Our job is to hunt for things that can be repurposed.
TEXT_KINGZF101_05155_WEZETONYI_000_002<tab>Care to give it a try? Take a look around the ruins to the south, and if you find anything of value, I'll see you duly compensated!

TEXT_KINGZF101_05155_WEZETONYI_000_003<tab>There are amazing discoveries to be had in the ruins─<var 1A 02 /var>if<var 1A 01 /var> you know where to look. Find something useful, and you'll be rewarded for your efforts.
TEXT_KINGZF101_05155_SYSTEM_000_004<tab>You dig through the mountain of debris, but find only shapeless planks of wood and nonfunctional electrope.
TEXT_KINGZF101_05155_SYSTEM_000_005<tab>You examine the broken streetlamp, but it's already been harvested for parts. Evidently someone has beaten you to the punch.
TEXT_KINGZF101_05155_SYSTEM_000_006<tab>As you patiently comb through the enshadowed wreckage, a gleam catches your eye, and you pull up a silver necklace!
TEXT_KINGZF101_05155_SYSTEM_000_007<tab>It's unlikely you will find anything more of value here. Return to Wezetonyi and apprise him of your discovery.
TEXT_KINGZF101_05155_WEZETONYI_000_009<tab>Oh ho! See that engraving? That's the Alexandrian coat of arms. And just look at the shape! How old is this thing?
TEXT_KINGZF101_05155_WEZETONYI_000_010<tab>It must have belonged to someone who lived in the old city generations ago─in any case, an impressive find, especially for your first try!
TEXT_KINGZF101_05155_WEZETONYI_000_011<tab>You, my friend, would make an excellent reforger. Here, take this payment for a job well done!
